scripts.postinstall: node ./decorate-angular-cli.js && ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main
scripts.bump-version:major: npm version major --force && cd libs/core && npm version major --force && cd ../ngxs && npm version major --force && cd ../ngrx && npm version major --force && cd ../react && npm version major --force
scripts.bump-version:minor: npm version minor --force && cd libs/core && npm version minor --force && cd ../ngxs && npm version minor --force && cd ../ngrx && npm version minor --force && cd ../react && npm version minor --force
scripts.bump-version:patch: npm version patch --force && cd libs/core && npm version patch --force && cd ../ngxs && npm version patch --force && cd ../ngrx && npm version patch --force && cd ../react && npm version patch --force
scripts.build:lib-pack: ng build core --prod && ng build ngxs --prod && ng build ngrx --prod && ng build react --prod && npm run copy-files && cd dist/libs/core && npm pack && cd ../ngxs && npm pack && cd ../ngrx && npm pack && cd ../react && npm pack
scripts.commit-git: git commit -m "build: adds new release" && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.publish:docs: ng build docs --prod && cp ./apps/docs/src/404.html ./dist/apps/docs/ && rm -rf ../state-adapt.github.io/* && cp -R ./dist/apps/docs/* ../state-adapt.github.io && cd ../state-adapt.github.io && git add . * && git commit -m 'Update' && git push origin master
